    Online Shop

    Treehouse loves to provide almonds and almond ingredients to its valued customers in the U.S. and Canada. Almonds for sale in this store are available only in quantities smaller than 1,500 pounds.

    Grow With Us

    We believe in transparency and honest communication. And our work style is still team-based, working together to innovate, process, and distribute the largest portion of California’s almonds to the world.

Sustainability

Treehouse is a leader in sustainable almond growing, advancing our operations and practices and guiding almond farmers as they strive to enhance their sustainability practices.

Our Mission

At Treehouse we pursue this mission every day: To deliver premium-quality almond ingredients to domestic and global branded food manufacturers—while maintaining respect for bees, farmers, society and the environment.

Our Values

Excellence

We strive for excellence in our products, processes and performance – and look for ways to improve our sustainable agriculture practices

Respect

We respect our customers, farmers, team members, suppliers and – most vitally – the natural environment that sustains us

Trust

We run our business thoughtfully and collaboratively, with an emphasis on transparency and square dealing

Orchard Stewardship

Treehouse and its almond farmers treat our orchards like the precious assets they are. We employ a zero-waste solution – Whole Orchard Recycling – to address almond orchards that have reached the end of their productive lives. We also raise bee-health awareness, partner with growers who protect pollinators, and earn certifications from the California Almond Stewardship Platform (CASP).

explore more

Facility Sustainability

Our state-of-the-art production facility creates superior almond ingredients while also unlocking optimal value from almond harvests and natural resources. We use 100% of the almond – the hull, shell and kernel – through a comprehensive processing approach that enhances sustainability.

FIND OUT MORE

Organic Almond Growing

We play a leadership role in helping California’s almond growers transition to increased organic almond output from their orchards. When almond growers embrace organic farming practices, they unlock powerful benefits for the planet and the future of their business.

FIND OUT MORE

The Almond Project & Other Case Studies

Treehouse California Almonds and one of its third-generation almond growers are proud partners in The Almond Project initiative. This multi-stakeholder initiative is aimed at preserving natural resources, enabling ecosystem regeneration, protecting farming communities, and ensuring the production of almonds for generations to come.

FIND OUT MORE

What Treehouse Family Members Say

Mi auctor lectus commodo tempor risus morbi dui porttitor ac. Amet malesuada eget nec nulla lobortis. Venenatis fringilla neque, et quam sed morbi amet natoque tellus. Vel bibendum in metus, rutrum. Nulla vel pretium sed urna.

John Doe, Chief Engineer

We saw an opportunity in the marketplace to create a new energy bar that would be very appealing in terms of flavor and texture, but that also would meet a high threshold for sustainable sourcing. Specifically, we wanted the almonds in the bar to be certified by reputable organizations, particularly in the area of protecting pollinators. The Treehouse team worked with us over a period of months, sending samples and discussing our feedback, until we had exactly what we wanted and in sync with our aggressive product launch schedule.

John Doe, Chief Engineer

The Almond Project

Treehouse California Almonds and one of its third-generation almond growers are proud partners in The Almond Project, a multi-year initiative aimed at advancing more sustainable almond farming methods.

John Doe, Chief Engineer

Social Sustainability Starts at Home

At Treehouse, sustainability encompasses the way we engage and support our team members. We strive to provide a safe working environment by conducting a range of programs that contribute to an excellent safety track record. We provide team members with competitive pay and benefits, as well as opportunities for career advancement. Team members also have access to a company-sponsored health plan as well as a 401(k) retirement savings plan – with a company match – which offers them a good measure of financial stability.

Meet the Treehouse Family
